meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jack Paleczny Blair Moorhead Joe Bartolomeo Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7441.

td.p: Jack Paleczny, a law student from Chicago, Illinois
Blair Moorhead, a social worker from Arlington, Virginia
Joe Bartolomeo, a professor and associate dean from Florence, Massachusetts (whose 2-day cash winnings total $36,500)

tr.td: WOMEN & THE AMERICAN REVOLUTION
THRILLER & SUSPENSE NOVELS
ONE-"I"d WORDS
AIRPORT
NOISE
A BATEMAN

Joe

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
